summary: Uncle Elroy and Day Day owe money on taxes so Craig finds a way to steal from the next door neighbors to pay off the taxes so Uncle Elroy's house doesn't get put up for auction.
cast: Ice Cube|Mike Epps|Justin Pierce|John Witherspoon|Don 'D.C.' Curry|Jacob Vargas|Lobo Sebastian|Rolando Molina|Lisa Rodríguez|Tom Lister Jr.|Kym Whitley|Amy Hill|Tamala Jones|The Lady of Rage|Carmen Serano|Maria Arcé|Vanessa White|Clifton Powell|Michael Blackson|Ronn Riser|David Earl Waterman|Cheridah Best|Sticky Fingaz|Shane Conrad|Keebo|Greg Bronson|Daniel Dehring|Faizon Love|Michael Rapaport|Chris Tucker
title: Next Friday
